mapper.select: SELECT r.resume_id, r.user_id, r.resume_title, r.resume_location, r.resume_job_category, r.resume_job_type, r.resume_job_duration, r.resume_work_schedule, r.resume_work_time, r.resume_job_skill, r.resume_introduction, e.education_id, e.edu_degree, e.edu_status, e.edu_school, e.edu_major, e.edu_admission_year, e.edu_graduation_year, c.career_id, c.career_company_name, c.career_join_date, c.career_quit_date, c.career_job_description, c.career_is_career FROM RESUMES r LEFT JOIN EDUCATION_HISTORIES e ON r.resume_id = e.resume_id LEFT JOIN CAREER_HISTORIES c ON r.resume_id = c.resume_id WHERE r.resume_id = #{resumeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUMES ( user_id, resume_title, resume_location, resume_job_category, resume_job_type, resume_job_duration, resume_work_schedule, resume_work_time, resume_job_skill, resume_introduction ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{resumeTitle}, #{resumeLocation}, #{resumeJobCategory}, #{resumeJobType}, #{resumeJobDuration}, #{resumeWorkSchedule}, #{resumeWorkTime}, #{resumeJobSkill}, #{resumeIntroduction} )

INSERT INTO EDUCATION_HISTORIES ( resume_id, edu_degree, edu_status, edu_school, edu_major, edu_admission_year, edu_graduation_year ) VALUES ( #{resumeId}, #{eduDegree}, #{eduStatus}, #{eduSchool}, #{eduMajor}, #{eduAdmissionYear}, #{eduGraduationYear} )

INSERT INTO CAREER_HISTORIES ( resume_id, career_company_name, career_join_date, career_quit_date, career_job_description, career_is_career ) VALUES ( #{resumeId}, #{careerCompanyName}, #{careerJoinDate}, #{careerQuitDate}, #{careerJobDescription}, #{careerIsCareer} )
mapper.update: UPDATE RESUMES SET resume_title = #{resume.resumeTitle}, resume_location = #{resume.resumeLocation}, resume_job_category = #{resume.resumeJobCategory}, resume_job_type = #{resume.resumeJobType}, resume_job_duration = #{resume.resumeJobDuration}, resume_work_schedule = #{resume.resumeWorkSchedule}, resume_work_time = #{resume.resumeWorkTime}, resume_job_skill = #{resume.resumeJobSkill}, resume_introduction = #{resume.resumeIntroduction} WHERE resume_id = #{resume.resumeId}

UPDATE EDUCATION_HISTORIES SET edu_degree = #{educationHistory.eduDegree}, edu_status = #{educationHistory.eduStatus}, edu_school = #{educationHistory.eduSchool}, edu_major = #{educationHistory.eduMajor}, edu_admission_year = #{educationHistory.eduAdmissionYear}, edu_graduation_year = #{educationHistory.eduGraduationYear} WHERE resume_id = #{resume.resumeId}

UPDATE CAREER_HISTORIES SET career_company_name = #{careerHistory.careerCompanyName}, career_join_date = #{careerHistory.careerJoinDate}, career_quit_date = #{careerHistory.careerQuitDate}, career_job_description = #{careerHistory.careerJobDescription}, career_is_career = #{careerHistory.careerIsCareer} WHERE resume_id = #{resume.resumeId}
